column2: Affiliate creates volume on Authorized Investigator's behalf
Someone on your volume added another collaborator (at editor/investigator level)
Someone added you to their Volume
Affiliate requests that Authorized Investigator share a Volume that they think is ready
Another editor on the Volume has checked the Assistance box
A highlight was created on your volume
Video or images were set to public
Someone added a tag on your Volume/session
